title: Riot gifted me a skin that I have already?
body: I logged in and I got a message that says, "You've earned blood moon talon from riot games". Is this a bug? I recently got Blood moon talon last week by buying a mystery gift lol {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

replies.body: Hmmm. Looks like that notification was just delayed for some really weird reason. There haven't been any other mystery gifts purchases, and I'm really not sure why that message decided that it needed to remind you about the skin. Maybe your client is just hella excited to get it's Blood Moon game on when Halloween rolls around xD

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ic3WRvFc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-26T02:22:55.891+0000)
>
> Hmmm. Looks like that notification was just delayed for some really weird reason. There haven't been any other mystery gifts purchases, and I'm really not sure why that message decided that it needed to remind you about the skin. Maybe your client is just hella excited to get it's Blood Moon game on when Halloween rolls around xD

hahaha probably xD well thank you for helping me out!
